dailyRehab.label: Posterior Axilla Ball
cues: Setup: Ball in posterior armpit, lean into wall.
Execution: Small slow arm sweeps; hunt for tender band.
Constraint: Pain ≤ 4/10, no numbness/tingling.

dailyRehab.label: Glute Med Wall Hold (Right)
cues: Setup: Right leg on floor, right hip to wall, left foot slightly away.
Execution: Push knee and hip into wall, keep pelvis level.
Constraint: No pelvic drop or trunk side-bend.

dailyRehab.label: Straight-Arm Pulldown Iso
cues: Setup: Arms slightly in front of body, elbows softly bent.
Execution: Pull to pockets and hold; ribs down, no back arch.
Constraint: No shrugging or elbow flare behind torso.

dailyRehab.label: Neutral-Grip Curl Iso
cues: Setup: Elbows near sides, neutral grip, cable in front of body.
Execution: Hold 60–90° elbow bend; keep wrist straight, no supination.
Constraint: Distal biceps pain ≤ 3/10, no sharp pulling at tendon.

workouts.name: Day 1 – Pull + Posterior Shoulder
workouts.notes: Focus on slow eccentrics and keeping elbows from over-traveling behind torso.

exercises.label: Neutral Lat Pulldown
cues: Setup: Neutral grip, hands just outside shoulders.
Execution: Pull to upper chest, pause, 3-sec lower.
Constraint: Elbows stop slightly in front of torso, no swinging.

exercises.label: Single-Arm Row (elbow stops at torso line)
cues: Setup: Hinge at hips, spine neutral, hand on bench or rack for support.
Execution: Row towards hip; elbow stops at torso line.
Constraint: No rotation through ribcage, no elbow behind torso.

exercises.label: Face Pull
cues: Setup: Rope at eye level, neutral/overhand grip.
Execution: Pull to nose/eyes, lead with elbows, squeeze mid-back.
Constraint: No lumbar extension; keep ribs stacked over pelvis.

exercises.label: Straight-Arm Pulldown (eccentric focus)
cues: Setup: Slight hip hinge, arms in front, elbows slightly bent.
Execution: Pull to pockets, 3-sec lower with control.
Constraint: No shrugging or rib flare.

exercises.label: Hammer Curl (neutral grip)
cues: Setup: Neutral grip, elbows close to sides.
Execution: Curl without swinging; think forearm vertical at top.
Constraint: No wrist flexion/extension; keep neck relaxed.

exercises.label: Incline Push-Up Simulation (Speediance handles high)
cues: Setup: Handles above mid-chest height, body in straight line.
Execution: Elbows ~30–45° from torso, full lockout at top.
Constraint: No sharp anterior shoulder pain, no sagging hips.

exercises.label: Chest Press (elbows tucked)
cues: Setup: Bench or standing, handles at mid-chest.
Execution: Press with elbows slightly tucked, not flared.
Constraint: No bar/handle dropping below chest and no bounce.

exercises.label: Rope Pressdown Isometric
cues: Setup: Elbows at sides, rope in neutral grip.
Execution: Extend to near lockout and hold; slight elbow bend.
Constraint: No shoulder roll-forward; no elbow drift behind body.

exercises.label: Reverse Cable Triceps Extension (straight-arm bias)
cues: Setup: Cable behind you, grip rope or handle with neutral/underhand.
Execution: Extend arm backward, focusing on long head of triceps.
Constraint: No reaching humerus too far behind body; shoulder stays centered.

workouts.name: Day 3 – Glute Tendon Strength
workouts.notes: No deep glute stretching. Prioritize controlled tempo.

exercises.label: Single-Leg Wall Hold (Right)
cues: Setup: Right leg stance, right hip/knee to wall, left foot slightly out.
Execution: Drive hip and knee into wall, feel side glute working.
Constraint: No shifting weight into low back; pelvis stays level.

exercises.label: Cable Hip Hike (slow)
cues: Setup: Cable on ankle of non-stance leg, stance leg on small step.
Execution: Drop and then hike pelvis slowly using stance-side glute.
Constraint: No side-bend through trunk; motion comes from pelvis.

exercises.label: Lateral Step-Down (slow eccentric)
cues: Setup: Stand sideways on step, working leg near edge.
Execution: 3-sec lower to tap heel, then drive back up.
Constraint: Knee tracks over toes, no valgus collapse.

exercises.label: Belted Hip Thrust (Speediance – Hip Belt)
cues: Setup: Cable low, hip belt at crease of hips, upper back on bench or box.
Execution: Drive hips up, squeeze glutes, 2-sec pause at lockout.
Constraint: No low-back arching; glutes do the work, pain ≤ 2/10.

workouts.name: Day 4 – Full-Body Strength Return
workouts.notes: This is the bridge from rehab to fireground.

exercises.label: Trap-Bar Cable Deadlift
cues: Setup: Feet hip-width, handles at mid-shin start.
Execution: Hinge hips back, push floor away, stand tall.
Constraint: No lumbar flexion; bar path stays over mid-foot.

exercises.label: Squat
cues: Setup: Feet shoulder-width, slight toe-out.
Execution: Sit between hips, keep chest up and knees tracking over toes.
Constraint: Depth only as tolerated without glute or knee spike.

exercises.label: Row (elbows tucked)
cues: Setup: Neutral spine, handles low to mid-abdomen line.
Execution: Pull with elbows tucked, squeeze shoulder blades.
Constraint: No elbow behind torso; no shrugging.

exercises.label: Floor Push-Up
cues: Setup: Hands under shoulders, body in straight line.
Execution: Lower with control, elbows ~30–45° from torso.
Constraint: Stop if posterior shoulder pain > 3/10.

exercises.label: Hammer Curl
cues: Setup: Neutral grip, elbows close to sides.
Execution: Curl without swinging, full control up and down.
Constraint: No distal biceps pain or aggressive stretch at bottom.
